text: Sergei Viktorovich Lobanov (; born 1 March 1984) is a former Russian professional football player. ==Club career== He played in the Belarusian Premier League in 2008 for FC Neman Grodno. ==External links== * * Category:1984 births Category:People from Lyubertsy Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Belshina Bobruisk players Category:FC Molodechno players Category:FC Neman Grodno players Category:FC Sheksna Cherepovets players Category:Belarusian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus
title: Sergei Lobanov
